title: webfacing
extract: An internet facing system is one that can be accessed from the public internet. Such access is not limited to web browser access via http or https. A system is internet facing if it broadcasts or responds to requests on any internet protocol (IP) open port and can be trivially communicated with from the internet.Jan 16, 2018
